statements: SELECT * FROM BarcodeSystem;
SELECT Product_Name, Quantity FROM BarcodeSystem WHERE Product_Category='Electronics';
SELECT Barcode_ID, Product_Name, Quantity FROM BarcodeSystem ORDER BY Product_Name DESC;
SELECT Product_Name, Product_Category FROM BarcodeSystem WHERE Quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM BarcodeSystem WHERE Product_Name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM BarcodeSystem ORDER BY Product_Name DESC, Quantity ASC
SELECT Product_Name, Product_Category FROM BarcodeSystem WHERE Quantity > 100
SELECT Barcode_ID, Product_Name FROM BarcodeSystem WHERE Product_Category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM BarcodeSystem WHERE Product_Category IS NULL
SELECT Barcode_ID, Product_Name, Quantity FROM BarcodeSystem WHERE Quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM barcodes;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM barcodes WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity, warehouse_name FROM barcodes INNER JOIN warehouses ON barcodes.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM barcodes WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM barcodes INNER JOIN warehouses ON barcodes.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_name;
SELECT * FROM barcodes WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM barcodes WHERE warehouse_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT b.product_name, b.quantity, w.warehouse_name FROM barcodes b JOIN warehouses w ON b.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id WHERE b.quantity < 5;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM barcodes;
SELECT warehouse_id, COUNT(barcode_id) AS count_barcodes FROM barcodes GROUP BY warehouse_id HAVING COUNT(barcode_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM product WHERE price < 50.0
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouse ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT product_id, name, barcode FROM product WHERE barcode IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT warehouse_id, location FROM warehouse WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product.name, warehouse.location, inventory.quantity FROM product JOIN inventory ON product.product_id = inventory.product_id JOIN warehouse ON inventory.warehouse_id = warehouse.warehouse_id;

SELECT warehouse.location, SUM(inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM warehouse JOIN inventory ON warehouse.warehouse_id = inventory.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse.location HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT warehouse_name, location, manager_name FROM Warehouse;
SELECT id, product_id, warehouse_id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT scanner_name, location FROM BarcodeScanner WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50 AND category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT p.product_name, w.warehouse_name, i.quantity FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.id WHERE i.quantity > 0 ORDER BY i.quantity DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, w.warehouse_name, i.quantity FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.id WHERE w.location = 'New York' AND p.category = 'Food' ORDER BY w.warehouse_name;
SELECT SUM(i.quantity) AS total_quantity, p.category FROM Inventory i JOIN Product p ON i.product_id = p.id GROUP BY p.category HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse;
SELECT id, location FROM Warehouse ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT warehouse_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY warehouse_id;
SELECT e.name AS employee_name, b.scan_time AS scan_time FROM Employee e JOIN BarcodeScan b ON e.id = b.scanned_by ORDER BY scan_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;

SELECT Product.name, Inventory.quantity, Warehouse.location FROM Product JOIN Inventory ON Product.id = Inventory.product_id JOIN Warehouse ON Inventory.warehouse_id = Warehouse.id WHERE Inventory.quantity > 10 ORDER BY Product.name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT p.name, i.quantity, w.location FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.id WHERE i.quantity <= 5 ORDER BY w.location DESC;
SELECT e.name, e.role, bs.scan_time FROM Employee e JOIN BarcodeScan bs ON e.id = bs.scanned_by WHERE bs.scan_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY bs.scan_time;
SELECT p.name, p.price, bs.scan_time, e.name AS scanned_by FROM Product p JOIN BarcodeScan bs ON p.id = bs.product_id JOIN Employee e ON bs.scanned_by = e.id ORDER BY bs.scan_time DESC;
